author: Tom Simonite
title: How Decades of Offshoring Led to a Mask Shortage in a Pandemic
description: US companies have shifted production overseas, especially to China. We got cheaper products. But now we can't make vital health care supplies.
content: If you can reach him, Gus Nasrallah, president and CEO of manufacturing equipment supplier Sharpertek in Pontiac, Michigan, can sell you a machine that cranks out the N95 face masks desperately needed by health workers treating Covid-19 patients. It will cost… [+5281 chars]
